pod.name: jpeg-utils
pod.summary: Wrapper functions around libjpeg to simplify JPEG compression and decompression with in-memory buffers.
pod.description: note: This is a simple enough library that you could just copy the .c and .h files in to your own programs.
pod.requirements:
libjpeg62
For faster performance, install libjpeg-turbo, an SSE-accelerated library that is ABI compatible with libjpeg62.
